statements.statement: select * from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION order by REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID

select R.* from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION RS inner join TM_REPORT R ON RS.SUB_REPORT_CODE = R.REPORT_CODE AND R.BENHVIEN_ID = RS.BENHVIEN_ID where RS.REPORT_CODE = '$REPORT_CODE$' AND RS.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'

select * from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID = '$REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_CODE = '$REPORT_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.SUB_REPORT_CODE = '$SUB_REPORT_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
order by REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID
select * from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION where TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID = '$value$' order by REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID
select * from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION where TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID = '$REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID$' order by REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID
statements.insert:
select TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION ( REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID , REPORT_ID , REPORT_CODE , SUB_REPORT_ID , SUB_REPORT_CODE , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #ID# , #REPORT_ID# , #REPORT_CODE# , #SUB_REPORT_ID# , #SUB_REPORT_CODE# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
statements.update: update TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION set REPORT_ID = #REPORT_ID# , REPORT_CODE = #REPORT_CODE# , SUB_REPORT_ID = #SUB_REPORT_ID# , SUB_REPORT_CODE = #SUB_REPORT_CODE# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# where REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID = '$REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID$'
statements.statement:
delete from TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID = '$REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION_ID$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_ID = '$REPORT_ID$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.REPORT_CODE = '$REPORT_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.SUB_REPORT_ID = '$SUB_REPORT_ID$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.SUB_REPORT_CODE = '$SUB_REPORT_CODE$'
TM_REPORT_SUB_DEFINITION.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
